title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Nov 25 2020
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - Nov 25 2020
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:                                    


Todd Herman guest hosts for Rush on Wednesday. Gratitude. From the first ship to the biggest military in history. Land of opportunity. Rush’s Mayflower tweet. The heart of freedom. Trump has unmasked mockingbird media. What the technocrats have planned. PA court rules to not certify election. Leftist propaganda in kindergarten. Truth-telling is bravery.                              


PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:                                     


Why are hapless governors and mayors playing games with COVID? We are to forget lies about masks, cases and voting system lies. Woody Jenkins finds after-hour voting increments for Biden in PA and GA. Shut up and do what you’re told. Patrick Byrne finds Dominion machines to be easily hacked. The danger of low-trust society. Begging the Democrats to take this to court. You’d be surprised how many agree with you. These patterns need to be explained.                                


PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:


The frightening plans of the technocrats. Democrat Party is the party of “because we said so.” Gavin Newsom’s bar tab. Will you trust the voting system if this doesn’t go to the courts? Demand logic. Google’s thirst for power cannot be satiated. Comparing the left with the founders. We need to be in the media to change the media. Form the MAGA Party. Happy Thanksgiving.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
